const Intro = () => { return (
{/* */}

Professor

Department of Machenical Engineering

Professor : Li Xu

Ph.D. University of California, Berkeley, Mechanical Engineering

Major: Thermal Engineering; Minors: Electrical Engineering, Material Science and Engineering

B. E. Thermal Engineering Department, Tsinghua University, Beijing, China

{/*

Professional experiences

- Co-founder, Redpoll Technology Ltd., Tai Chung

- Technical Manager, TSMC Solar, Tai Chung

- Senior Engineer, Applied Materials Inc., Santa Clara, CA, USA

*/} {/* Contact Information */}

Ph.D. University of California, Berkeley, Mechanical Engineering

Professional experiences

- Co-founder, Redpoll Technology Ltd., Tai Chung

- Technical Manager, TSMC Solar, Tai Chung

- Senior Engineer, Applied Materials Inc., Santa Clara, CA, USA

Hornors and Awards

- Team Excellence Award, Passivation Technology Team,by Applied Materials Q2, 2010

- National Deanâ€™s Scholarship (2001-2002 US)

- Fellowship for Excellent Students (Beijing Tsinghua University for 1996-1999)

Research Interests

- Photovoltaic Technology (Solar Cells etc.)

- Energy System

- Flexible Devices

- Laser Assisted Material Processing at Micro and Nano Scales

Teaching course

- Heat and Mass transfer

- Thermodynamics

- Renewable Energy

- Laser Material Processing

) } export default Intro
